Hi all,

I have a singleton class which establishes a connection to our server 
and I initializes it in 'oneTimeSetup' as described in FAQ (#3). Now I 
want to clean this connection when I reload the classes manually (I 
don't want to close it every time I run some tests, so I didn't put it 
in 'oneTimeTearDown'). I tried putting the cleanup code in 'finalize' 
method of the class but that never gets called when I reload the 
classes. So how can I close the connection when I reload the classes?

thanks


Kamal
